fields.helpText: VAT number is mandatory for account creation for all countries except France, Spain and UK.

fields.fieldText: National ID or Tax Number exception

fields.fieldText: Account General Information

fields.name: DisplayExistingAccount_0
fields.fieldText: Please select the existing account for {!Get_Lead.Company}:

fields.name: Intercommunity_VAT_number_0_0
fields.helpText: A tax Number or taxpayer identification number, also known as a TIN for short, is a number issued to organizations to track tax obligations and payments they make. Do not enter any spaces in the field.

fields.name: National_Id_Exception_0
fields.fieldText: National ID or Tax Number exception

fields.name: AccountErrorMessage
fields.fieldText:
A problem occured while updating the account linked to the contact lead.

It might be because of a duplicate rule violation. You can contact your Salesforce administrator for help.

fields.name: ContactErrorMessage
fields.fieldText:
A problem occured while updating the contact linked to the contact lead.

You can contact your Salesforce administrator for help.

fields.name: End
fields.fieldText:
This lead is now qualified.


You can click the "Finish" button and then you are able to convert it by clicking on the "Converted" button.

fields.name: End_0
fields.fieldText:
This contact lead is now qualified.

The account file and contact file have been updated.


You can click the "Finish" button and then you are able to convert it by clicking on the "Converted" button.

fields.name: ErrorMessage_0
fields.fieldText: ﻿Error : Please fill all required fields.

fields.name: LeadChosenSolution_0
fields.fieldText: Lead's chosen Solution: {!Get_Lead.Lead_s_Chosen_Solution__c}

fields.fieldText: The correct account cannot be found, I want to specify another company.

textTemplates.name: FriendlyErrorMessage
textTemplates.text:
<p><b>Something went wrong with this flow.</b></p>
<p>This might be because you forgot to fulfill a mandatory field.</p>

textTemplates.text: If you recognise that this lead will not became new business, please check this field.
